enchantment.benssharks.serrated.desc: Applies the Bleeding effect to mobs on hit.
enchantment.buddycards.buddy_boost.desc: Boosts the buff gained from a Buddycard medal.
enchantment.buddycards.recovery.desc: Reduces cooldown duration for the Luminis Helmet and Zylex Boots
enchantment.buddycards.extra_page.desc: Adds an extra page to a Buddycard binder.
enchantment.celestisynth.pulsation.desc: Has a chance to deals bonus damage and knockback on hit.
